title: Microphone does not work
content:
I bought my Pixel 5 phone on May 11 in Best Buy, already on the 13th I ran into the problem that no one heard my through calls and voice messages. I tried to record audio using the "Dictaphone" application. There is NO sound on the recording, so the lower microphone does not work! The upper microphone is working, I recorded a video with sound using the Camera application Google Camera.
I have already tried updating my Android phone to the latest version and even reset it to factory settings. Nothing helped! Where should I go with such a problem? I'm abroad at the moment
Waiting for your response
